hymn.title: And we have the prophetic word

layout.singingstanza: And we have the pro -- phet -- ic word made more firm, to which you do well to give heed as to a lamp shin -- ing in a dark place, un -- til the day dawns and the morn -- ing star ris -- es in your hearts.
layout.singingstanza2: [skip43] un -- til the day dawns and the morn -- ing star ris -- es in your hearts.

lyrics.stanza: And we have the prophetic word Made more firm, to which you do well To give heed as to a lamp Shining in a dark place,
Until the day dawns And the morning star Rises in your hearts. (repeat)
